 GeneCounts getGeneCounts(Gene gene, int extensionFactor)
           
 IntervalTree<Alignment> getIntervalTree(java.lang.String chr, int start, int end)
          public IntervalTree getIntervalTree(String chr, int start, int end){ //System.err.print("Building tree from "+chr+" "+start+"-"+end + " - " ); int counter=0; IntervalTree tree=new IntervalTree(); CloseableIterator iter=getAnnotationOverlappingRegion(new Alignments(chr, start, end)); while(iter.hasNext()){ Alignment record=iter.next(); Annotation t1=new Alignments(record.getChr(), record.getAnnotationtart(), record.getAlignmentEnd()); Annotation t2=new Alignments(chr, start, end); if(t1.overlaps(t2)){ //System.err.println("Getting interval overlappers "+start+"-"+end+" "+record.getChr()+":"+record.getAnnotationtart()+"-"+record.getAlignmentEnd()); Node node=tree.find(record.getAnnotationtart(), record.getAlignmentEnd()+1); if(record.getMappingQuality()>1){ if(node!=null){node.incrementCount();} else{tree.put(record.getAnnotationtart(), record.getAlignmentEnd()+1, record);} counter++; } } //else{System.err.println("WARN: Doesnt overlap queried: "+chr+":"+start+"-"+end+" got "+record.getChr()+":"+record.getAnnotationtart()+"-"+record.getAlignmentEnd());} } iter.close(); //System.err.println(tree.size()+" "+counter); return tree; }

getIntervalTree

public IntervalTree<Alignment> getIntervalTree(java.lang.String chr,
                                               int start,
                                               int end)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
public IntervalTree getIntervalTree(String chr, int start, int end){ //System.err.print("Building tree from "+chr+" "+start+"-"+end + " - " ); int counter=0; IntervalTree tree=new IntervalTree(); CloseableIterator iter=getAnnotationOverlappingRegion(new Alignments(chr, start, end)); while(iter.hasNext()){ Alignment record=iter.next(); Annotation t1=new Alignments(record.getChr(), record.getAnnotationtart(), record.getAlignmentEnd()); Annotation t2=new Alignments(chr, start, end); if(t1.overlaps(t2)){ //System.err.println("Getting interval overlappers "+start+"-"+end+" "+record.getChr()+":"+record.getAnnotationtart()+"-"+record.getAlignmentEnd()); Node node=tree.find(record.getAnnotationtart(), record.getAlignmentEnd()+1); if(record.getMappingQuality()>1){ if(node!=null){node.incrementCount();} else{tree.put(record.getAnnotationtart(), record.getAlignmentEnd()+1, record);} counter++; } } //else{System.err.println("WARN: Doesnt overlap queried: "+chr+":"+start+"-"+end+" got "+record.getChr()+":"+record.getAnnotationtart()+"-"+record.getAlignmentEnd());} } iter.close(); //System.err.println(tree.size()+" "+counter); return tree; }

Specified by:
getIntervalTree in interface AlignmentDataModel
Throws:
java.io.IOException
